GET MY INVITE

A free, cloud-based solution for forensic nurses, forensic practitioners and healthcare organizations.

Position your organization for success with tools to help you achieve HIPAA compliance, Meaningful Use, and many more regulatory requirements.

FEATURES

Cloud-Based

Curious about the cloud? Now be a part of it. With SANEchart, your patient documentation and administration panel go wherever you are. So, login online from any device and get down to work.

Data Sharing*

Keep community providers like advocay, legal practices and law enforcement in the loop with an integrated portal that allows you to share files and truly provide patient-centered care. All with the highest levels of encryption. You're safe with SANEchart!

Exam Templates

Don't need that 5-page strangulation assessment in your chart? Our templates have exam-specific modules to help you stay lean and efficient in your practice. It's best way to declutter!

Photo Uploading*

Exhausted from switching between two different files to access your charting and your images? By upgrading, you have access to tools to help you streamline your documentation and keep photos with your charts.

QI Tools*

No more printing out endless duplicates of charts in order to perform quality improvement. With SANEchart, simply add comments and diagrams ONLINE to help staff identify where they can improve their practice and become more efficiency.

Report Creation*

We love research! And even better-- SANEchart allows you to access, measure, and analyze data to guide you in helping other organizations utilize your findings for evidenced-based practice.

*With upgrade

FAQs

What is SANEchart?

SANEchart is a cloud-based solution for forensic nurses, forensic practitioners and healthcare organizations to help them organizations documents more efficiently and securely.

Is SANEchart really free?

Yes! To document and store your patient exams, SANEchart is the solution to you paper, hybrid and piece-together models. And, we've even added lots of features-- like photo uploads, cloud-based sharing and QI tools to help you improve your practice. Look at our upgraded plans.

Is SANEchart secure?

We have the best solution out there for forensic documentation and storage. All of your files are encrypted, so you know you're safe.

How do I get started?

Take a look at all our plans (including the free plan) to see which one suites your organization's needs.

How can we contact you?

That's simple! Just see our contact page for details.
